text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Weeks pass without inicident, and<n>Fine Motion's been
happily training<n>away with her friends.

text_block_list.name: Fine's Friend
text_block_list.text: Later, Fine! Today was a real<n>workout!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Go get some rest! See you tomorrow!
choice_data_list: You all worked really hard today.
You all worked really hard today.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Hehe. It was so much fun, I didn't<n>notice how tired I am.
Every day is so<n>lovely, it feels like I'm dreaming.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
That aside, though—I think it's time<n>we called it a day. Let's
head back to<n>your office and have our meeting!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I run over my notes in my head, ready<n>to wrap up the day,
and then... I unlock<n>the office door to chaos.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Wait... What happened?!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
A cabinet in the corner lies fallen, face<n>down, its files
scattered about the<n>crime scene.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Hmmm... That's the thing—the room<n>was locked with no one
inside. But<n>surely the cabinet didn't knock itself<n>over, with
how far the papers are<n>scattered.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
It's like we're in a book! Oh, Trainer!<n>I think we've
stumbled upon a bona<n>fide mystery!
choice_data_list: Uhhh... Yeah, sure, let's go with that.
Uhhh... Yeah, sure, let's go with that.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Hehehe, don't you worry now...<n>Detective Fine is on the
case!
choice_data_list: I didn't take you for such a mystery buff...

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Ah, ahem... Now, we've got a crime<n>scene to investigate!
I've read that<n>observation is a detective's greatest<n>asset.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
...And would you look at that?! My<n>dear assistant, I do
believe our<n>perpetrator has left us footprints!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Hehehe, I told you I've got more than<n>ramen up in my
noggin! I bet these<n>tracks will lead us straight to the truth.

text_block_list.name: Cat
text_block_list.text: Meow!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: ..."Meow"?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
We follow the prints to my desk,<n>where a cat looks up at us,<n>
wide-eyed with apprehension.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: I see... The pieces are all coming<n>together!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: The culprit... is you!

text_block_list.name: Cat
text_block_list.text: MREOOOW!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: It's okay, we aren't mad at you.<n>Come on out.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Oh? It looks like you've got a collar.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
The question is, whose? I guess our<n>poor little friend must
have got<n>themself lost and wandered here.

text_block_list.name: Cat
text_block_list.text: Mew... Mreow!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Shhh, don't worry. We'll help you get<n>home.
choice_data_list: Think we can sleuth out who they belong to?
Think we can sleuth out who they belong to?

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Of course! We'll have this case<n>cracked in no time! First
order of<n>business—asking around for clues. ♪

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
We check if the students near my<n>office saw anything and
follow hints<n>through a grapevine of ramen joints<n>around
town until finally...

text_block_list.name: Pet Owner
text_block_list.text:
I can't thank you two enough! I was<n>terrified we'd never
find our little<n>baby!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
It was our pleasure. We'll take our<n>leave now, so have a
wonderful<n>evening.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Ahem! I would say that's case<n>closed! And I couldn't have
done it<n>without my trusty sidekick.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Hehe, that was fun. I wasn't<n>expecting such an adventure.
choice_data_list: It's nice having a change of pace, huh?
It's nice having a change of pace, huh?

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Oh, it really is. Hehe, a little surprise to<n>liven up the routine...
Something<n>special...

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Hehe, I think I can arrange that.
